resources.string: Monitors apps and blocks short-form video feeds to help you stay focused.

To enable Derot, you need to grant accessibility permissions.

1. Tap the button below
2. Find "Derot Video Feed Blocker"
3. Enable the service

Derot will then run in the background and block short-form video feeds in apps like X, Instagram, TikTok, and others.
Shows when Derot is actively blocking video feeds
